== Mullassery (CT) (627808) ==

Mullassery (CT) is a town in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 7.12 sq. km. and harbouring 2973 households with total population of 12165 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 304 km. Male population is 5551 and female population is 6614. Scheduled Caste population is 1408 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the town is 627808<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 82 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 12 km.
